::Killer/Annihilator/Prowl::

Killer's eyes widen as he sees Iron Raptor transform and lunge at him. He 
spins around, but crashes into her outstretched claws. Spinning back around, 
he manages to fire his launcher at her before her teeth close around his 
torso.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator looks in shock at the huge maximal that had just attacked Killer. 
He takes a few steps back, calling Shuko and Set for backup on his comm-link.

Aiming his gun carefully at the back of Iron Raptor's neck, he nearly pulls 
the trigger before an acid pellet hits his side, causing him to drop his gun. 
He yells in pain, pulling out a pistol and firing it at Prowl.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl ducks under Annihilator's shot, rolling forward and slamming his 
double-bladed knuckle weapon (look at his bio on the site, you'll see what I 
mean) into the predacon's side.
